thread.title: Ex-Trump aide pleads guilty in Russia probe

title: Ex-Trump aide pleads guilty in Russia probe
text:
Ex-Trump aide pleads guilty in Russia probe 12:52am GMT - 01:23 
A former senior official in Donald Trump’s 2016 presidential campaign, Rick Gates, pleaded guilty on Friday to conspiracy against the United States and lying to investigators, and is cooperating with a federal probe into Russia’s role in the election.   
A former senior official in Donald Trump’s 2016 presidential campaign, Rick Gates, pleaded guilty on Friday to conspiracy against the United States and lying to investigators, and is cooperating with a federal probe into Russia’s role in the election.  //reut.rs/2EPkKYM
